17:45 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like you broke XAR plugin  
17:45 <tmortagne> it does not support a XAR project without source anymore  
17:45 <tmortagne> that's what break XE build  
17:46 <tmortagne> probably https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/2c2f003cb9889f37aa7009e05d6b3045612d2d32#diff-098c92b7d224a1d1220ced0225c7c84e or https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/47e120fc7ddda82122ef613dd9fc1c3de3f03cba#diff-098c92b7d224a1d1220ced0225c7c84e  
17:53 <vmassol> checking, thanks  
17:54 <vmassol> grrrr  
17:54 <vmassol> I ran the func tests but apparently we don't have an integration tests with a XAR project with no sources  
17:55 <vmassol> I'll fix it, I have to travel back home in a few minutes so I'll try to fix it in the train
